sentences.english: Mohr-style pipets are made from glass tubing of uniform bore. Mohr.
sentences.chinese: 型移液管由孔徑均勻的玻璃管制成。

sentences.english: It usually shows up more as speed and aperture increase.
sentences.chinese: 當感光度和孔徑增加的時候，這種現象往往會加重。

sentences.english: The flexibility of synthetic aperture radar can be improved by implementing the digital techniques.
sentences.chinese: 實現數字技術將使合成孔徑雷達具有更大的靈活性。

sentences.english: The image acquired from synthetic aperture radar is a holographic image.
sentences.chinese: 合成孔徑雷達獲得的圖像是一種準全息圖像。

sentences.english: Subsequently, the characteristic of the bi-static synthetic aperture radar is produced.
sentences.chinese: 然後介紹了雙基地合成孔徑雷達的某些特性。

sentences.english: It is a key step of manufacturing the large relative aperture aspherical surface to make a breakthrough at the technology.
sentences.chinese: 突破這一技術是研製大相對孔徑非球面的關鍵環節。

sentences.english: As the outer bore diameter is larger than the inner one, the filter cartridges have a good deep-level filtering capability.
sentences.chinese: 濾芯過濾孔徑外大內小，具有優良的深層過濾效果。

sentences.english: We explore the birefringence characterization of twin-core fiber (TCF) with high numerical apertures.
sentences.chinese: 具體分析了具有高數值孔徑的雙芯光纖的雙折射特性。

sentences.english: The application of sub-aperture stitching in long optical flat was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究子孔徑拼接在長平晶測試中的應用。

sentences.english: Hence the value of high numerical aperture for such specimens.
sentences.chinese: 因此對這標本需採用大數值孔徑的物鏡。

sentences.english: Generally, grazing reflective imaging and coding aperture imaging methods have been adopted more and more.
sentences.chinese: 目前多采用掠入射反射成像和編碼孔徑成像方法。

sentences.english: A set of technological equipment of front_to_back spot facing which is suited for different aperture is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一套能適應不同孔徑的正反向鍃平的工藝裝備。

sentences.english: In this paper, a new technique about long distance source localization with passive synthetic aperture sonar array is presented.
sentences.chinese: 該文討論了被動合成孔徑聲吶遠程定位問題。

sentences.english: During the day the lower limit is about 8 to 10 times the aperture.
sentences.chinese: 白天時的下限是孔徑的8到10倍。

sentences.english: The pore distribution of sponge palladium was investigated by using BJH equation.
sentences.chinese: 採用BJH方程對吸附等溫線進行孔徑分佈規律研究。

sentences.english: This method is compared with classical noise jamming technique by means of SJR (Signal to Jamming Ratio) gain and jamming power gain of SAR system.
sentences.chinese: 討論了這種干擾方法對合成孔徑雷達圖像的干擾效果。

definition: external diameter (including thickness of the wall)

pinyin: shen1 ti3 zhi4 liang4 zhi3 shu4

definition: (of sth that has been deformed) to spring back to original shape/(fig.) to rebound/to bounce back
